org.presentation.singlepagecontroller

Interface SinglePageChecker

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MessageProducer, Option, Stoppable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CSSValidatorImpl, HTMLValidatorImpl

    public interface SinglePageChecker
extends MessageProducer, Option, Stoppable
    Interface for every type of single page control. Jindřich Máca
    Author:
    radio.koza

      • isApplicable

        boolean isApplicable(ContentType contentType)
        Method quickly response, if page with passed contentType can be checked by this implementation of SinglePageControllerService.
        Parameters:
        contentType - ContentType of the page
        Returns:
        true if it is applicable; false otherwise
